EmailTemplate.name: Challenged financial assessment
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: {!Case.CaseNumber} CHALLENGED FINANCIAL ASSESSMENT - {!Account.Name}: {!Account.IATACode__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear PwC,
IATA Code: {!Account.IATACode__c} Agent Name: {!Account.Name} Financial Review Type: {!Case.Financial_Review_Type__c}
The Agent has challenged the financial assessment received on {!Case.Assessment_Performed_Date__c}.
The reason for the challenge is: - interpretation of local criteria - calculation of ratios - financial security calculation - other (what?)
Kindly review the challenge and provide your comments as a reply to this email.
Attached you may find: 1. The challenge in writing 2. The financial assessment as performed
Thank you.
Best regards, IATA Agency Risk Management
